column5: Hi all, been a while since I have been on here, but looking for a recommendation for family camping on Rice Lake.  3 kids 16, 14 and 11.  I have a tent trailer, but hydro is not essential.  Have stayed at Golden Beach Resort years ago and it was just ok...looking for something better. Must haves - great shoreline fishing for pan fish (no boat). My kids love fishing. Nice to have - pool, water activities, resort activities Thanks in advance!
